ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at PENGUIn-2, Antarctica, 1 s, Level-2 data, AGO Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat -84.4, Long 58.0). Station Code: PG2.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: C. R. Clauer, This effort is supported by the National Science Foundation throught the following awards: ANT0839858, ATM922979 (Virginia Tech), and ANT0838861 (University of Michigan).

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb FTP Access
AccessURL.Description: NASA/GSFC CDAWeb ftp access to the data.

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATION_DATE: Thu Feb 23 16:13:13 2012

CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Open data for non-commercial, scientific use.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pg2_epoch
Parameter.Description: Variation in Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pg2_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pg2.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pg2_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pg2.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pg2_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pg2.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_pg2_time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pg2_epoch

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_pg2_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pg2_epoch0, thg_mag_pg2_time.
